Hero.hello: I am an AI-ML Engineer focused on Natural Language Processing and Robotics. I build intelligent solutions using Python, Deep Learning, and Next.js.

Projects.title: My Projects
Projects.description: Take a look at what I've been building
Projects.kangri: Neural Machine Translation (NMT) system for the low-resource language using M2M100.
Projects.accident: Real-time video analysis system for detecting vehicle accidents using OpenCV and Computer Vision.
Projects.somato: Frontend clone of the Zomato application with dynamic restaurant listings and shopping cart.

Responsibilities.title: Responsibilities
Responsibilities.point1: Data Pipeline & Alignment: Curated and manually aligned a parallel dataset for a Himachali dialect, developing a custom cleaning pipeline using Regex to ensure data quality.
Responsibilities.point2: Architectural Analysis: Implemented and compared three distinct architectures: a custom Baseline Transformer (trained from scratch) versus fine-tuned multilingual models NLLB-200 and M2M-100. Also experimented with IndicTrans2 and mBART during the selection process.
Responsibilities.point3: Rigorous Evaluation: Benchmarked model performance using industry-standard metrics, specifically focusing on BLEU, chrF, and TER. Additionally calculated Perplexity, BERTScore, and F1 Score to ensure a holistic assessment of semantic accuracy and fluency.
Responsibilities.point4: Visualization: Utilized Graphviz to visualize model architectures and attention mechanisms.
Responsibilities.point6: Optimize model performance and inference time.

Achievements.title: Key Results
Achievements.point1: Developed a custom NLP model improving sentiment analysis accuracy by 20%.
Achievements.point2: Automated data extraction pipeline reducing manual effort by 80%.
Achievements.point3: Deployed computer vision system for real-time monitoring.

IIIT.title: B.Tech in Data Science & Artificial Intelligence

Coursework.point1: CS Core: Data Structures, Algorithms, DBMS, Operating Systems
